answers.answer: Just go get the dang food woman! Feed that baby what it wants!! :)
Lol i always debate that too!! It's just too damn hot to cook and plus it'll be 10x better cuz your craving it lol :)
OMG ! I go through that all the time. Save money or satisfy my cravings? Most of the time I go buy what I'm craving and then cry about wasting my money. Then I do it again next week (:
Haha I'm all scared to eat too much bad food because i dont want to get preeclampsia. But i do out any ways :/
I'm just goina do it but not make it a habit like I used to lol. I can eat leftovers tomorrow
That would be cool if this page had a picture option lol enjoy!!
Omg I do the same thing. Fast food really does add up lol....get it!
Just get it lol cause until you get it your gonna drive yourself crazy thinking about it
I had a dream about a hamburger and when I woke up I went straight to McDonalds this morning hahaha. Enjoy!

question: I really want popcorn chicken and chili cheese tots from sonic but I've been trying to save money by not spending it on fast food and junk. But I really want it even thou I have plenty food in my house!
title: Save money or cave to my craving?
